UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Induction of bacteriocin production in Lactobacillus sake by a secreted peptide.
Literature.Author: Eijsink VG, Brurberg MB, Middelhoven PH, Nes IF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis LMG 2708(IC50=>25µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum LMG 2003(IC50=>25µg/ml),Loigolactobacillus coryniformis subsp. torquens LMG 2308(IC50=32µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum LMG 2375(IC50=>210µg/ml),Latilactobacillus sakei LMG 2313(IC50=74µg/ml),Latilactobacillus sakei LTH673 BAC+(IC50=>25µg/ml),Latilactobacillus sakei LTH673 Bac-(IC50=>25µg/ml),Latilactobacillus sakei LMG 2376(IC50=>210µg/ml),Pediococcus pentosaceus LMG 2319(IC50=200µg/ml),Pediococcus pentosaceus LMG 2722(IC50=>210µg/ml)
